document.full_text: san diego state's kawhi leonard, who continues to deal with the shooting death of his father three years ago, has led the aztecs to their first n.c.a.a. tournament victories.
document.title: for kawhi leonard, perseverance is his biggest accomplishment
lines_and_colors: san diego state's kawhi leonard, who continues to deal with the shooting death of his father three years ago, has led the aztecs to their first n.c.a.a. tournament victories.
